overview: Portrait of Margarita, who after living and fighting against gender violence in the city of Tepic, seeks to find a meaning to her life and existence, as the word death resonates frequently in the local news.  Delicate images and their juxtapositions serve as the narrative thread of the protagonist's story. A moving voice-over portrays the struggle of women living the harsh reality of Tepic Nayarit.
title: Portrait
